CAMEO.DESCRIBE:
Register for free.
Without obligation.
Easy and secure communication. Mobile and desktop
Connect with all your contacts.
Explore our smart features.
Register today!

INFO.TERMS: You need to accept the terms of use.

WARN.REGISTRATION_FAILED: Bei der Registrierung ist ein Fehler aufgetreten. Bitte versuchen Sie es erneut.

WELCOME.HEADLINE: Welcome to cameoNet!
WELCOME.TEXT_1: cameoNet is an open source messenger that makes end-to-end encryption easy for safe, private and business communication.
WELCOME.TEXT_2: Attention: This is a first beta version!
WELCOME.TEXT_3: The app may contain errors, the user interface is still under development and many new features will be added in future versions. As we cannot guarantee the storage of your messages up to 100% it may be sensible when you copy all your important data first.
WELCOME.TEXT_4: Please help us to improve cameoNet.
WELCOME.TEXT_5:
We are happy about when you post us any error or improvement on http://support.cameonet.de
Thank you! Your cameoNet-Team.

QUICKSTART.HEADLINE: Quick Start
QUICKSTART.SUB_TEXT: Just a few operations are required to design your first secure talk:
QUICKSTART.TEXT_1: An individual cameoKey is needed for all members of a secure talk. You don't have one? Please open Settings > cameoKeys.
QUICKSTART.TEXT_2: To find friends or peers please press 'Add Contact' in the app header and choose 'Search cameoNet' to select a cameoID or display name. If you have selected one, please send him or her a 'Contact Request'. After the confirmation of your request the contact will be included to your 'Contacts'.
QUICKSTART.TEXT_3:
You can send messages to contacts from your list by clicking the 'Add Mail' icon right in the line. A new talk will be opened. Please enter a subject (optional), write a message and press the 'Send Button (paper plane)'.

Congratulations! You have just led your first encrypted talk!
QUICKSTART.TEXT_4: If you have any questions regarding our service, feel free to let us a short notice through our platform http://support.cameonet.de.

KEYINFO.SKIP_CHECKBOX_TEXT: Don't show me this page again

TERMS.HEADING: General Business Conditions
TERMS.PARAGRAPH_1: German law and regulations applie for the use of the service cameoNet. At the moment, the offer and the use of the service is restricted to the European Union. Germany (Halle) is the exclusive place of jurisdiction for any disputes, in case the user has no general place of jurisdition in Germany.

UPDATE.ERROR: Something went wrong, please try again

OVERVIEW.INFO_TEXT: You can switch between your identities and create new.

EXPLANATION.UNTRUSTED_KEYS:
For this identity you already obtain cameoKeys. These keys are installed on other devices and are not trusted at the moment.
To read encrypted talks on all of your devices, please link the cameoKeys together.
EXPLANATION.ALL_KEYS_TRUSTED: For '{{Identity}}' you have a cameoKey that allows you to read all encrypted talks on your device.

KEYLIST.LABEL_OTHERKEYS: cameoKeys on other devices/ other browsers or apps

START.HEADLINE: Generate cameoKey
START.EXPLANATION:
On this device you don't have a cameoKey tied to this identity.
For secure communication please generate or import a cameoKey first.

GENERATING.HEADLINE: Generation of cameoKey in progress!
GENERATING.EXPLANATION:
Please be patient. This process can take some time according to the technical parameter of your device and the size of the cameoKey.
If it lasts more than 5 minutes, you may stop the process and start again.

SAVE.HEADLINE: cameoKey was generated successfully!
SAVE.EXPLANATION: Each cameoKey consists of a private part that will be stored on your device only and a public part that has to be transferred and stored on our server.
SAVE.NOTE: To avoid loss of encrypted data please open your cameoKey and copy it's private part to a safe place on your computer - we recommend to use a password safe.

AUTHENTICATION.HEADLINE: Link cameoKey
AUTHENTICATION.EXPLANATION: To read encrypted messages written under {{identity}} on other devices, please link the local cameoKey with all other keys that you are using there.

START.INSTRUCTIONS: Please press 'Link up' to start the process.
START.NOTE: Attention! Before pressing 'Link up' you should first open cameoNet with your identity {{identity}} on another device!

WAIT.INSTRUCTIONS: Please press 'Abort request' to stop the process.
WAIT.NOTE: Request has been started. Please confirm the request on the other device.

SUCCESSFUL.INSTRUCTIONS: You have successfully linked your cameoKeys! In a few seconds, all previous talks that have been created by the linked cameoKeys will be egible.

ENTER_TRANSACTION_SECRET.INSTRUCTIONS: On another device a cameoKey is stored that is not linked to this device. Therefore it is not possible to read encrypted data on this device and vice versa.
ENTER_TRANSACTION_SECRET.NOTE: If you want to link cameoKey '{{cameoKey}}' with your local cameoKey, please enter the code displayed on the other device:

DONE.INSTRUCTIONS: You have successfully linked your cameoKeys!

MODAL.SUCCESS: You have successfully linked your cameoKeys!

TRUST.HEADLINE: Trust contact
TRUST.EXPLANATION: By using the trust process you can verify whether an identity is of an individual that you know in person.
TRUST.TIMEOUT: The process will be stopped in {{timeout}} seconds.

START.INSTRUCTIONS: If you like to trust this contact please press 'Request', to send an inquiry for trusting each other.
START.NOTE: Attention! Before you press 'Request' the contact has to be registered to cameoNet as {{identity}}.

WAIT.INSTRUCTIONS: Please press 'Stop request' to stop the process.
WAIT.NOTE: '{{identity}}' has to enter the above code to confirme your inquiry:

SUCCESSFUL.INSTRUCTIONS:
The trust process has been executed successfully.
Now '{{identity}} and you are trusting each other.
SUCCESSFUL.NOTE: You can close this dialogue now.

ERROR.VERIFY: Trust process missed - please try again.

ENTER_TRANSACTION_SECRET.INSTRUCTIONS:
Recently {{identity}} has started a trust process with you.
By using the trust process you can verify whether an identity is of an individual that you know in person.
ENTER_TRANSACTION_SECRET.NOTE: If you like to trust {{identity}}, please enter the code displayed on the device of {{identity}} here:

WARN.FAILED: The creating of new identity has failed. Please try again later.

KEYS.NO_LOCALKEYS_ON_THIS_DEVICE:
On this device you don't have a cameoKey tied to this identity.
For secure communication please generate or import a cameoKey first.
KEYS.UNTRUSTED_PUBLICKEYS_EXISTS:
You have cameoKeys for this identity on several devices that are not authenticated. You cannot read messages written and encrypted on devices with not authenticated cameoKeys.
To authenticate a cameoKey click on next to the cameoKey in the list below.
KEYS.EXPORT_KEY_DESCRIPTION: Please export your private cameoKey. Make sure to keep it safe. You can use it to recover all your encrypted data.
KEYS.GENERATE_INFO_TEXT: Please be patient. The process time will vary according to the technical parameter of your hardware and the selected key force. If the waiting time exceeds 5 minutes, please stop the process and restart.
KEYS.STOREKEY_DESCRIPTION:
The cameoKey consists of a public and a private part. The private part will be stored on this device only. It is important to keep it secret since it can decrypt all of your data.
The private part should be exported to a safe place for data recovery purpose if the device is lost.

KEY_TRANSMISSION_SYMMETRIC.NAME: Encryption relies on a password.
KEY_TRANSMISSION_SYMMETRIC.DESCRIPTION_NEW: Encryption with a password is not bad in itself, but the strength of the encryption greatly depends on the password you choose. You have to use a password because not all recipients have a proper key available to you.
KEY_TRANSMISSION_SYMMETRIC.DESCRIPTION: Encryption with a password is not bad in itself, but the strength of the encryption greatly depends on the password you choose. You have to use a password because not all recipients had a proper a key available when the conversation started.
KEY_TRANSMISSION_SYMMETRIC.DESCRIPTION_PRIVATE_KEY_MISSING: You do not have a cameoKey on this device.

NO_SYMMETRIC_KEY_TRANSMISSION.NAME: This talk is safely encrypted with cameoKeys.

HAS_PASSCAPTCHA.NAME: PassCaptcha enabled.
HAS_PASSCAPTCHA.DESCRIPTION: Using the passCaptcha method makes it harder to automatically decrypt your messages on a large scale, but it is not actually save.
